About Me

Hi, Im Blessed. My friends call me Woody. Im a programmer

I started programming when I was 16, since then i have always been a fan of technology. I like improving myself by getting involved in as many projects as I can, if you want me to do a project for you [Contact Me]. I am currently in my 2nd year at Harare Institute Of Technology doing Software Engineering, my areas of interest are Web Development, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning you can checkout some of my work at GitHub. I am also a member of HIT Web Tech as current Chairperson.
